mapper.select: SELECT TITLE , MAX(SUBJECT) AS SUBJECT , (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(TITLE)) FROM TB_BLOG_M) AS TITLE_COUNT , (SELECT COUNT(SUBJECT) FROM TB_BLOG_M) AS TOTAL_SUBJECT_COUNT , (SELECT COUNT(SUBJECT) FROM TB_BLOG_M SUB WHERE SUB.TITLE = M.TITLE) AS SUBJECT_COUNT FROM TB_BLOG_M M GROUP BY TITLE, SUBJECT;
SELECT TITLE , IDX FROM TB_BLOG_M M GROUP BY TITLE;
